pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multivariate Analysis // Package for multivariate analysis, having functions that perform simple correspondence analysis (CA) and multiple correspondence analysis (MCA), principal components analysis (PCA), canonical correlation analysis (CCA), factorial analysis (FA), multidimensional scaling (MDS), hierarchical and non-hierarchical cluster analysis, linear regression, multiple factor analysis (MFA) for quantitative, qualitative, frequency (MFACT) and mixed data, projection pursuit (PP), grant tour method and other useful functions for the multivariate analysis.
